SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , T1.SPR_NM AS SPR_NM , T1.SPR_TYPE_CD AS SPR_TYPE_CD , T1.SPR_TYPE_NM AS SPR_TYPE_NM , T1.SPR_STDTM AS SPR_STDTM , T1.SPR_EDDTM AS SPR_EDDTM FROM ( SELECT A.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , A.SPR_NM AS SPR_NM , A.SPR_DESC AS SPR_DESC , A.SPR_TYPE_CD AS SPR_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, 'SPR00001', A.SPR_TYPE_CD, '1') AS SPR_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.SPR_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SPR_STDTM , TO_CHAR(A.SPR_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SPR_EDDTM , TO_CHAR(A.SPR_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SPR_STDTM_DAY , TO_CHAR(A.SPR_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SPR_EDDTM_DAY FROM SPR1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.SPR_ID DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.SPR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SPR_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.SPR_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND TO_DATE(T1.SPR_STDTM_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#searchStartDt#, 0, INSTR(#searchStartDt#, ' ')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(T1.SPR_EDDTM_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#searchEndDt#, 0, INSTR(#searchStartDt#, ' ')), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
